actions.committee: Senate Committee on Labor and Human Resources
actions.text: Read second time and referred to Senate Committee on Labor and Human Resources.

actions.in_committee: Senate Committee on Labor and Human Resources
actions.text: Committee on Labor and Human Resources requested executive comment from OMB; Health and Human Services Department.

actions.in_committee: Senate Committee on Labor and Human Resources
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Aging, Family and Human Services.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Aging, Family, and Human Services

official_title: A bill to amend the Older Americans Act of 1965 to assure that the nutrition projects under that Act may include meals in a congregate setting or home delivered meals, or both, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Older Americans Amendments of 1980 - Amends the Older Americans Act of 1965 to specify that nutrition projects under such Act may include either meals in a congregate setting or home-delivered meals, or both.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Older Americans Act of 1965 to assure that the nutrition projects under that Act may include meals in a congregate setting or home delivered meals, or both, and for other purposes.
